replies.txt_content: 进入后台，插件文件夹里面有个GroupManagers文件夹，进入globalgroups文本，找到Builder栏，将你说的那些删除就好了
Ps:一般来讲权限前面都会有essentials，所以只要看后面就好了

replies.author: 寂寞先生会
replies.txt_content:
/mangdelp Builder essentials.me
/mangdelp Builder essentials.nick
/mangdelp Builder essentials.hat

replies.author: LoganSKY
replies.txt_content:
寂寞先生会 发表于 2017-7-30 20:10
/mangdelp Builder essentials.me
/mangdelp Builder essentials.nick
/mangdelp Builder essentials.hat
这样不行

replies.author: LoganSKY
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp Builder -essentials.me
/mangaddp Builder -essentials.nick
/mangaddp Builder -essentials.hat复制代码

添加这个权限就可以禁掉了，也可以直接在essentials中builder一栏想要禁用指令前加-     ←这个
不要直接输入mangdelp  没用的

replies.author: LoganSKY
replies.txt_content:
LoganSKY 发表于 2017-8-7 00:59
添加这个权限就可以禁掉了，也可以直接在essentials中builder一栏想要禁用指令前加-     ←这个
不要直接 ...
说错了，在essentials  player-commands:
